statements: SELECT * FROM clients_contact_information;
SELECT client_name, email_address FROM clients_contact_information WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, phone_number FROM clients_contact_information WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM clients_contact_information WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT client_id, client_name, email_address FROM clients_contact_information ORDER BY client_id DESC;
SELECT client_name, email_address FROM clients_contact_information WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM clients_contact_information WHERE email_address LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT client_name, phone_number FROM clients_contact_information ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT client_id, client_name, email_address, address FROM clients_contact_information WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM clients_contact_information WHERE client_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM clients ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT client_id, email, phone_number FROM clients WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT client_id, first_name, last_name, communication_type, communication_date FROM clients JOIN communications ON clients.client_id = communications.client_id WHERE communication_type = 'Email';
SELECT client_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT client_id, communication_date, communication_content FROM communications WHERE client_id IN (SELECT client_id FROM clients WHERE client_id > 3);
SELECT client_id, first_name, last_name, communication_type FROM clients JOIN communications ON clients.client_id = communications.client_id ORDER BY communication_date DESC;

SELECT first_name, last_name, communication_type, communication_content FROM clients JOIN communications ON clients.client_id = communications.client_id WHERE communication_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_id, client_name, email, phone_number FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM clients ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT client_id, client_name, email, phone_number FROM clients WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT ch.client_id, ch.contact_date, ch.contact_method, ch.description, c.client_name FROM contact_history ch JOIN clients c ON ch.client_id = c.client_id ORDER BY ch.contact_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM clients ORDER BY client_id DESC;
SELECT client_name, email, phone_number FROM clients WHERE client_id = 3;
SELECT client_id, client_name, email FROM clients WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT c.client_name, c.email, a.city FROM clients c JOIN addresses a ON c.client_id = a.client_id;
SELECT ch.contact_date, ch.contact_method, c.client_name FROM contact_history ch JOIN clients c ON ch.client_id = c.client_id ORDER BY ch.contact_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM client_contacts;
SELECT client_name, email FROM client_contacts WHERE contact_id = 1;
SELECT contact_id, client_name, phone_number, address FROM client_contacts WHERE client_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM contact_history ORDER BY history_date DESC;
SELECT contact_id, log_date, communication_type FROM communication_logs WHERE communication_type = 'Email' ORDER BY log_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM client_contacts;
SELECT client_name, email, phone_number FROM client_contacts WHERE client_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM contact_history ORDER BY history_date DESC;
SELECT client_name, email, update_description FROM client_contacts cc JOIN updates_history uh ON cc.contact_id = uh.contact_id;

SELECT cc.client_name, cl.log_date, cl.communication_type, uh.update_description FROM client_contacts cc JOIN communication_logs cl ON cc.contact_id = cl.contact_id JOIN updates_history uh ON cc.contact_id = uh.contact_id WHERE cl.log_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Clients;
SELECT client_name, email FROM Clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, phone_number FROM Clients ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT client_name, address FROM Clients WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT client_name, email, address FROM Clients WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' LIMIT 3;
SELECT client_name, email FROM Clients WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM Contacts ORDER BY contact_name DESC
SELECT client_name, phone_number, subscription_type FROM Clients JOIN Subscriptions ON Clients.client_id = Subscriptions.client_id
SELECT contact_name, email, phone_number FROM Contacts WHERE client_id = 3
SELECT * FROM Interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting'
